name: The Astonishing Adventures of Mr. Weems and the She Vampires
name_original: The Astonishing Adventures of Mr. Weems and the She Vampires
description:
The Astonishing Adventures Of Mr Weems And The She Vampires is a video game developed by RamJam Corporation in 1987. The game is loosely based upon the 1985 Atari Games arcade title Gauntlet.

The title and character name bear a striking similarity to "The Indestructible Mr. Weems," a 1957 episode of Alfred Hitchcock Presents, which may be meaningful or coincidental.
